== Introduction ==
The following lists the current teams involved with the development of Kubuntu as well as the members involved in those teams. If you have questions about any one of the teams, please contact either a person within the team, or ask in <code>#kubuntu-devel</code> on <nowiki>[[InternetRelayChat|IRC]]</nowiki>.
